topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.0 Alpha: Sample ldap.json File for Installing the KVM + ESX Topology

body.p: The process for installing the KVM + ESX deployment requires several JSON files that will be used when deploying the HLM VM.
body.section:
<<<<<<< .merge_file_BpSflK
The following represents a sample ldap.json file in the <cloudname>/vars directory of the HLM VM. The IP addresses are masked for security purposes. Use values appropriate for your environment. =======
The following represents a sample ldap.json file. The IP addresses are masked for security purposes. Use values appropriate for your environment.
The user admin name and password must be present in LDAP:
"ldap_username": "admin", "ldap_password": "admin_001",
>>>>>>> .merge_file_Sr4gWJ
Return to Installing the KVM + ESX Deployment. { "product": { "version": 1 },
"property-groups": [ { "name": "ldap-vars", "properties": { "ldap_domain_name": "americas", "ldap_url": "10.1.2.44", "ldap_username": "admin", "ldap_password": "admin_001", "ldap_domain": "dc=helioncg,dc=local", "ldap_ou": "CGTestUsers", "ldap_enabled": 1 } } ] }
